General.Name: Ningbo Peace Bird Fashion
General.Description: Ningbo Peacebird Fashion Co., Ltd. operates as a consumer-centric fashion brand retailer in China. The company develops and sells fashion products under the PEACEBIRD WOMEN, PEACEBIRD MEN, LEDIN, MATERIAL GIRL, Mini Peace, PETiT AVriL, COPPOLELLA, and PEACEBIRD LIVIN' brands. It offers its products through self-operated and franchisees through stores, and e-commerce platform. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: No. 258, Xinhui South Road, Ningbo, China, 315000
